<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>e24318f8-4ad9-486b-aa43-a25eefa91281#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A hetvenes évek</string>
            <string language="en">The seventies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Siebziger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les années '70</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os seventies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli anni settanta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δεκαετία του '70</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los años 70</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hetvenes évek, évek, hetvenes</string>
            <string language="en">seventies, years, seventy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Siebziger, Jahre, siebzig</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">années '70, années, soixante-dix</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">seventies, anos, setenta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anni settanta, anni, settanta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεκαετία του '70, έτη, εβδομήντα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">años 70, años, setenta</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">12-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>449</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>

    </metadata>
